biotools.summary: Tic suppression training meant to help you build your ability to fight tics. Implements a strategy called reward-enhanced exposure and response prevention (RE–ERP), focusing only on increasing the duration of time for which the user can suppress tics through automated differential reinforcement of tic-free periods (DRO).

bioschemas.name: TicTrainer
